The Vaults of the Dead beneath [[Atur]] are a vast complex that served as the center of [[Karrnath]]â€™s [[necromantic|necromancy]] war machine. Its fortified facilities include workshops for the production of [[undead]], warehouses for storing bones and bodies, and the vast catacombs that currently hold the vast majority of [[Karrnathi undead]] that have been sealed below since the [[Treaty of Thronehold]] was signed. 

The Night Forge can also be found within the Vaults of the Dead, which produces the distinctive armor of the [[Karrnathi undead]], which is fitted to their fleshless bones.

The Vaults of the Dead are maintained by the [[Ministry of the Dead]], a government agency that is not connected to the [[Blood of Vol]] faith or the [[Crimson Monastery]].
title: Vaults of the Dead
